name: Watson & Teddy PlayTest
description:
Watson & Teddy – Play Test Version

This is the play test version of Watson & Teddy. A 2.5D platform game currently in development that tells the amazing story of two heroic terriers in their search for their stolen treats.

Survey
https://forms.gle/mWJfTLNRgF4W6KmB8

Player Controls

Move Left: A or Left Arrow

Move Right: D or Right Arrow

Run: Shift+A, Shift+D or Shift+Left Arrow, Shift+Right Arrow

Jump: Space

Dash: F

Wall Cling Left: Space+A or Space+Left Arrow

Wall Cling Right: Space+D or Space+Right Arrow

Feature List

Player can walk, run, jump, double jump, triple jump, dash, wall cling and collect pickups.  Player will respawn when health reaches zero. Player can hurt certain enemies by jumping on them.
